ruling: - If you activate the effect of [[Nobleman-Eater Bug]] and select 2 monsters, then [[Ring of Destruction]] is chained and destroys 1 of the selected monsters, you still destroy the remaining monster when [[Nobleman-Eater Bug]]'s effect resolves.
- If [[Nobleman-Eater Bug]] is the only monster on the field and it is flipped face-up, then it destroys itself with its effect.
